item: Owned end-to-end mobile architecture decisions across multiple React Native applications, including code structure, state management, performance strategy, and release workflows.
Defined and enforced engineering standards for mobile development, testing, and CI/CD pipelines across distributed teams.
Led architectural design reviews and mentored engineers across seniority levels, raising overall code quality and system reliability.
Partnered with Product, UX, and Backend leadership to align mobile technical strategy with business objectives and delivery timelines.
